title: 怎么设置岩浆不能放在地上的
author: Lanny

replies.author: 小炫迈
replies.txt_content: 在essential的设置里面，岩浆桶的编号是273，查找一下就 了

replies.author: TRely
replies.txt_content: 使用banitm插件禁止岩浆桶被合成

replies.author: Le_Star
replies.txt_content: 这样一般是ban 岩浆桶id了。百度就会有指令

replies.author: mchappytowncc
replies.txt_content: essentials/config/里把岩浆的代码添加上去
